page.title: 18Yarm food
page.content: In Yarm there are altogether 13 eating places in the High Street. The prices are quite reasonable.The meals are something like this:_ At a restaurant: Medallions of pork Roquefort, Terrine campagniola, Sweets from trolley Â£9.60 At a take-away: Curried Leg of Chicken and boiled rice Â£2.25 Pineapple 50p These are just a few examples of the cost of food in eating places in Yarm 1985. The names in 1985 of the eating places in Yarm are: Public Houses, The New Cross Keys,George and Dragon,Union Arms,Black Bull,Green Tree. Take aways, Yarm Chop Suey Palace. Cafes, Danbys,Mrs Parkers,Ellens,Sparks, Harveys,Stricklands.Restaurants, Santoros.
